titleStmt.title: The loue of VVales to their soueraigne prince expressed in a true relation of the solemnity held at Ludlow in the countie of Salop, vpon the fourth of Nouember last past. Anno Domini. 1616. Being the day of the creation of the high and mighty Charles, Prince of Wales, and Earle of Chester, in his Maiesties palace of White-Hall.
titleStmt.author: Powel, Daniel.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
